mapper.insert: insert into p_order(order_id, m_no, postnum, address, detailed_address, recipient_name, recipient_phone, order_price, p_no, op_no1, option_quantity1, op_no2) values(#{order_id}, #{m_no}, #{postnum}, #{address}, #{detailed_address}, #{recipient_name}, #{recipient_phone}, #{order_price}, #{p_no}, #{op_no1}, #{option_quantity1}, #{op_no2})
mapper.select: select * from member m join p_order po on m.m_no = po.m_no join product p on po.p_no = p.p_no limit 0, 30

select count(*) from member m join p_order po on m.m_no = po.m_no join product p on po.p_no = p.p_no
and m.m_id like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
select * from p_order o join product p on o.p_no = p.p_no where o.m_no = #{m_no}
select * from p_order o join product p on o.p_no = p.p_no where o.m_no = #{m_no} limit 0, 10
mapper.update: update p_order set p_return='n' where order_no=#{order_no}
update p_order set p_return='y' where order_no=#{order_no}
update cart c join p_option op on c.p_no = op.p_no set op_stock=(#{op_stock}-#{option_quantity1}) where cart_no = #{cart_no} and op_no = #{op_no}
